title: Chinese hand-pulled noodles in beef broth
ingredients: ['For the soup', '4L water', '1kg boneless beef shoulder, cubed', '20g root ginger, sliced', '2 tablespoons Sichuan peppercorns', '2 dried tsaoko', '2 pieces dried mandarin orange peel', '4 bay leaves', '2 tablespoons salt, or to taste', 'For the noodles', '1kg plain flour', '600ml water', '4 tablespoons oil', 'To garnish', '500g daikon, peeled and sliced', '3 stalks green garlic, chopped', '1 bunch fresh coriander, chopped', 'chilli oil, to taste (optional)']
